name: GitCreatePullRequest
description: Automatically create a git pull request.
author: Sander Aernouts

inputs.name: sourceBranch
inputs.label: Source branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch the pull request will merge **from**.

inputs.name: targetBranch
inputs.label: Target branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch the pull request will merge **to**.

inputs.name: autoComplete
inputs.label: Auto complete
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the pull request to automatically complete when all policies are satisfied.

inputs.name: bypassPolicy
inputs.label: Bypass branch policies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bypass policies set on the branch the pull request merges into.

inputs.name: deleteSourceBranch
inputs.label: Delete source branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete the source branch after the pull request has been completed

inputs.name: squashMerge
inputs.label: Squash merge
inputs.helpMarkDown: Perform a squash merge when merging the pull request into the target branch
